name: Jump Flip - Endless Jump
description:
Jump Flip is a casual game, the design purpose is kill time.

The control and rule of the game are simple. Slightly rotate your device to control direction. And don't fall into water. That's it.

Control the box and jump to next base. It is simple anyone can do it. The game speed is not fast anyone can easy to control.

Once again, Jump Flip is a casual kill time game. Design purpose : Let everyone can play this game and no need to think anything when playing. If you are nothing to do and want to relax. Jump Filp is your best choice.
